vyādhi jarā maraṇa asaṃpratyaya cittāḥ sarva saṃyojana adhiṣṭhita cittāḥ sarva nīvaraṇa parigraha cittāḥ
dharma dhvaja prapātana cittāḥ dṛṣṭi dhvaja ucchrayaṇa cittāḥ paraspara avarṇa cittāḥ anyonya bhakṣaṇa cittāḥ
dveṣa samudgrahaṇa cittāḥ anyonya āghāta cittāḥ kāmebhyaḥ tṛpta cittāḥ

original: sarvaparigrahamātsaryacittā akṛtajñacittāḥ paradārākramaṇacittā vyāpādavihiṃsanacittā apraṇidhānacittāḥ sattvāstatkāle
analyzed: sarva parigraha mātsarya cittāḥ akṛtajña cittāḥ para dāra ākramaṇa cittāḥ vyāpāda vihiṃsana cittāḥ apraṇidhāna cittāḥ sattvāḥ tad kāle
bhaviṣyanti
ime ca atra śabdāḥ paraspara antikāt śṛṇvanti

original: narakaśabdastiryagyoniśabdo yamalokaśabdo vyādhiśabdo jarāśabdo maraṇaśabdo vadhakaśabdo
analyzed: naraka śabdaḥ tiryagyoni śabdaḥ yama loka śabdaḥ vyādhi śabdaḥ jarā śabdaḥ maraṇa śabdaḥ

original: kāmamithyācāraśabdo mṛṣāvādaśabda utpātaśabdaḥ paiśunyaśabdaḥ paruṣaśabdaḥ saṃbhinnapralāpaśabda
analyzed: kāma mithyā ācāra śabdaḥ mṛṣāvāda śabdaḥ utpāta śabdaḥ paiśunya śabdaḥ paruṣa śabdaḥ saṃbhinna pralāpa śabdaḥ

imān ca te sattvāḥ parasparasya antikāt śṛṇvanti

original: evaṃrūpaiḥ parihīṇakuśalamūlaiḥ parihīṇakalyāṇamitrairduṣṭacittaiḥ sattvaistasmin kāle sahālokadhāturākīrṇā bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: evaṃrūpaiḥ parihīṇa kuśala mūlaiḥ parihīṇa kalyāṇa mitraiḥ duṣṭa cittaiḥ sattvaiḥ tasmin kāle sahā lokadhātuḥ ākīrṇā bhaviṣyati
ujjhitāḥ ca te sattvāḥ bhaviṣyanti sarvajñaiḥ śūnyaiḥ buddhakṣetraiḥ yathā anna pāna dama saṃyama kuśala karma kriyā kuśala samavadhānā

original: āryāṣṭāṅgena mārgeṇa virahitāstamastamaḥparāyaṇāḥ pragāḍhakarmapratyayena te sattvāstasmin
analyzed: ārya aṣṭāṅgena mārgeṇa virahitāḥ tamaḥ tamaḥ parāyaṇāḥ pragāḍha karma pratyayena te sattvāḥ tasmin
samaye bhadra kalpe viṃśa uttara varṣa śata āyuṣkeṣu pratyājāyiṣyanti

original: teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ karmapratyayena sahabuddhakṣetraṃ hīnaṃ bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: teṣām sattvānām karma pratyayena saha buddhakṣetram hīnam bhaviṣyati
sarvaiḥ avarupta kuśala mūlaiḥ sattvaiḥ parivarjitam
sa lavaṇā ca pṛthivī bhaviṣyati
pāṣāṇa śarkara pāṃśu śīlā parvata utkūlā ca dharaṇī bhaviṣyati
paruṣa daṃśa maśaka āśīviṣa caṇḍa mṛga pakṣibhiḥ ākīrṇā bhaviṣyati
viṣama kāla kaluṣāḥ vāyavaḥ vā asyanti
viṣama kāla virasa lavaṇa vimiśrāḥ aśani varṣā patiṣyanti

original: tathārūpāḥ pṛthivyāṃ śaṣpauṣadhitṛṇavṛkṣā patrapuṣpaphalā dhānyarasāḥ sattvānāmannapānabhogaparibhogaviṣamāḥ (KpSū 238)
analyzed: tathārūpāḥ pṛthivyām patra puṣpa phalāḥ dhānya rasāḥ sattvānām anna pāna bhoga paribhoga viṣamāḥ
kaluṣa paruṣa rukṣa viṣa saṃsṛṣṭāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: te sattvāḥ paribhaktyā bhūyasyā mātrayā rukṣā duṣṭāścaṇḍā raudrāḥ paruṣāḥ kadaryāḥ paribhāṣakā anyonyāgauravā bhītena cittenāghātacittā
analyzed: te sattvāḥ paribhaktyā bhūyasyā mātrayā rukṣāḥ duṣṭāḥ caṇḍāḥ raudrāḥ paruṣāḥ kadaryāḥ paribhāṣakāḥ anyonya a gauravāḥ bhītena cittena āghāta cittāḥ
vadhaka cittāḥ bhaviṣyanti
māṃsa bhojana rudhira āhārāḥ mṛga carma prāvaraṇāḥ praharaṇa adhiṣṭhānāḥ prāṇi vadha udyuktāḥ rūpa kula vaṃśa aiśvarya śāstra lipi aśva ārohaṇa dhanuḥ graha āyudha parivārā
mātsarya darpitāḥ bhaviṣyanti
vividha lūha tapa vrata abhiyuktāḥ bhaviṣyanti lokāḥ

original: tatkālamahaṃ tuṣitabhavanādavatīrya viśiṣṭe cakravartikulavaṃśe īśvare rājakule agramahiṣyāḥ kukṣau vaineyasattvakuśalamūlaparipācanārthaṃ
analyzed: tad kālam aham tuṣita bhavanāt avatīrya viśiṣṭe cakravarti kula vaṃśe īśvare rāja kule agramahiṣyāḥ kukṣau vaineya sattva kuśala mūla paripācana artham

original: sarvāvantaṃ tasmin samaye sahe buddhakṣetre udāreṇāvabhāsena sphureyaṃ,
analyzed: sarvāvantam tasmin samaye sahe buddhakṣetre udāreṇa avabhāsena sphureyam

original: ūrdhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanaparyanto 'haṃ heṣṭhaṃ yāvat kāñcanacakraparyantamudāreṇāvabhāsena sphureyaṃ /
analyzed: ūrdhvam yāvat akaniṣṭha bhavana paryantaḥ haṃ heṣṭham yāvat kāñcana cakra paryantam udāreṇa avabhāsena sphureyam

original: ye ca tasmin samaye sattvā sahe buddhakṣetre pratyājātā narakeṣu vā tiryagyonau vā yamaloke vā devamanuṣye (KpSū 239)
analyzed: ye ca tasmin samaye sattva a sahe buddhakṣetre pratyājātāḥ narakeṣu vā tiryagyonau vā yama loke vā deva manuṣye

original: vā te sarve tamavabhāsaṃ paśyeyuḥ spṛśeyuḥ saṃjāneyuḥ;
analyzed: vā te sarve tam avabhāsam paśyeyuḥ spṛśeyuḥ saṃjāneyuḥ

original: teṣāṃ saṃsāre vimṛśatāṃ duḥkhodvignānāṃ nirvāṇābhilāṣamantaśaḥ kleśaśamacittānyutpādayeyuḥ /
analyzed: teṣām saṃsāre vimṛśatām duḥkha udvignānām nirvāṇa abhilāṣam antaśas kleśa śama cittāni utpādayeyuḥ
idam prathamam agra mārga bījam avaropayeyam

original: yadāhaṃ sarvadharmanayavipaścitaṃ sarvasamādhinirdeśamekadharmamukhamaparāntakalpanirdeśena samāhitacitto daśamāsāṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nivaseyaṃ;
analyzed: yadā aham sarva dharma naya vipaścitam sarva samādhi nirdeśam eka dharma mukham apara anta kalpa nirdeśena samāhita cittaḥ daśa māsām mātuḥ kukṣau nivaseyam

original: yāvāṃścāhaṃ prāpte buddhatve sattvāṃ parikhinnāṃ saṃsāre parimocayeyaṃ /
analyzed: yāvān ca aham prāpte buddhatve sattvām parikhinnām saṃsāre parimocayeyam

original: te sattvā mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ daśamāsāṃ maṇigarbhasaṃdarśanasamāhitacittaṃ paryaṅkena niṣaṇṇaṃ paśyeyuḥ /
analyzed: te sattvāḥ mātuḥ kukṣi gatam daśa māsām maṇi garbha saṃdarśana samāhita cittam paryaṅkena niṣaṇṇam paśyeyuḥ

original: nirgate ca daśamāse sarvapuṇyasaṃcayenāhaṃ samādhinā sarvāvantaṃ sahabuddhakṣetraṃ ṣaḍvikāraṃ dharaṇīṃ cālayeyaṃ,
analyzed: nirgate ca daśa māse sarva puṇya saṃcayena aham samādhinā sarvāvantam saha buddhakṣetram ṣaṣ vikāram dharaṇīm cālayeyam

original: ūrdhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanaparyantaṃ heṣṭimena ca yāvat kāñcanacakraparyantaṃ ṣaḍvikāreṇa cālayeyaṃ /
analyzed: ūrdhvam yāvat akaniṣṭha bhavana paryantam heṣṭimena ca yāvat kāñcana cakra paryantam ṣaṣ vikāreṇa cālayeyam

original: ye ca tasmin samaye sahe buddhakṣetre sattvāḥ pratyājātā narakeṣu vā yāvan manuṣyeṣu vā tān prabodhayeyaṃ /
analyzed: ye ca tasmin samaye sahe buddhakṣetre sattvāḥ pratyājātāḥ narakeṣu vā yāvat manuṣyeṣu vā tān prabodhayeyam
yadā aham mātuḥ dakṣiṇe kukṣau abhiniṣkrameyam

original: punarapi ca sarvāvantaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetramudāreṇāvabhāsena aphureyaṃ; (KpSū 240)
analyzed: punar api ca sarvāvantam saham buddhakṣetram udāreṇa avabhāsena aphureyam

original: tadāpi tasmin samaye sarvān sahe buddhakṣetre sattvān saṃcodayeyaṃ,
analyzed: tadā api tasmin samaye sarvān sahe buddhakṣetre sattvān saṃcodayeyam
an avarupta kuśala mūlānām sattvānām santāne nirvāṇa bījam prakṣipeyam
avaropita nirvāṇa bīja santatīnām sattvānām samādhi aṅkuram avaropayeyam

original: yadā cāhaṃ caraṇatalena dharaṇīṃ spṛśeyaṃ sarvāvatī tasmin samaye sahe buddhakṣetre ṣaḍvikāraṃ dharaṇīṃ cālayeyaṃ prakaṃpayeyaṃ kṣobhayeyaṃ  #
analyzed: yadā ca aham caraṇa talena dharaṇīm spṛśeyam sarvāvatī tasmin samaye sahe buddhakṣetre ṣaṣ vikāram dharaṇīm cālayeyam prakaṃpayeyam kṣobhayeyam

original: tadāhaṃ tasmin samaye sattvān jalaniśritāṃ kṣitiniśritāṃ khaniśritāṃ caturyoniparyāpannāṃ pañcagatisaṃniśritāṃ tān sarvān ahaṃ pratibodhayeyaṃ,
analyzed: tadā aham tasmin samaye sattvān jala niśritām kṣiti niśritām kha niśritām catur yoni paryāpannām pañca gati saṃniśritām tān sarvān aham pratibodhayeyam
yeṣām santāne sattvānām anutpannam samādhāna aṅkuram ropayeyam
dṛḍha samādhāna aṅkurām tribhiḥ yānaiḥ a vaivartikām sthāpayeyam

original: sahajātamātrasya ca me yāvadeva tasmin sahe buddhakṣetre mahābrahmāṇo vā mārā vā
analyzed: sahajāta mātrasya ca me yāvat eva tasmin sahe buddhakṣetre mahābrahmāṇaḥ vā mārāḥ vā

original: maharddhikā vā yakṣarākṣasanāgāsurā vā sarve mama pūjākarmaṇe upasaṃkrāmeyuḥ /

original: sarvapuṇyasamuccayenāhaṃ samādhinā tathārūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ yattatsarvāvatī sā parṣattribhiryānaiḥ (KpSū 241)
analyzed: sarva puṇya samuccayena aham samādhinā tathārūpam dharmam deśayeyam yat tat sarvāvatī sā parṣad tribhiḥ yānaiḥ
prasādam pratilaṃbhayet

original: ye ca tatra parṣadi sattvāḥ śrāvakayānikā bhaveyuste caramabhavikā mama vaineyā bhavikā;
analyzed: ye ca tatra parṣadi sattvāḥ śrāvaka yānikāḥ bhaveyuḥ te caramabhavikā mama vaineyā bhavikā

original: ye ca tatra sattvāḥ pratyekabuddhayānikā bhaveyuste vairocanakusumāṃ kṣāntiṃ pratilabheyuḥ;
analyzed: ye ca tatra sattvāḥ pratyekabuddha yānikāḥ bhaveyuḥ te vairocana kusumām kṣāntim pratilabheyuḥ

original: ye ca tatra sattvā anuttaramahāyānikā bhaveyuste sarve vajradharasamudrasaṃkopitaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheran,
analyzed: ye ca tatra sattvāḥ anuttara mahāyānikāḥ bhaveyuḥ te sarve vajradhara samudra saṃkopitam samādhim pratilabheran

original: tena ca samādhinā tisrā bhūmīḥ samatikrāmeyuḥ /
analyzed: tena ca samādhinā tisraḥ bhūmīḥ samatikrāmeyuḥ

original: yadahaṃ snāpanamiccheyaṃ ye ca tatra mahānāgarājāno viśiṣṭatarā bhaveyuḥ te māṃ snāpayeyuḥ;
analyzed: yat aham snāpanam iccheyam ye ca tatra mahā nāga rājānaḥ viśiṣṭatarāḥ bhaveyuḥ te mām snāpayeyuḥ

original: ye ca sattvā māṃ snāpayamānaṃ paśyeyuste sarve tribhiryānairevaṃrūpān guṇānadhigaccheyuḥ yathā proktaṃ /
analyzed: ye ca sattvāḥ mām snāpayamānam paśyeyuḥ te sarve tribhiḥ yānaiḥ evaṃrūpān guṇān adhigaccheyuḥ yathā proktam

original: ye ca māṃ sattvā rathamabhirohantaṃ samanupaśyeyurvistareṇa kumārakrīḍavividhaśilpasthānakarmasthānāsanāni
analyzed: ye ca mām sattvāḥ ratham abhirohantam samanupaśyeyuḥ vistareṇa kumāra krīḍa vividha śilpasthāna karmasthāna āsanāni
ca dadarśa śikṣāpana yogyam strī agāre pañca kāma guṇa rati krīḍā ardharātrau udvigna niṣkramaṇa alaṅkāra vibhūṣaṇa choraṇam
lohita vastra abhīkṣṇam kāṣāya vastra paryeṣaṇa bodhivṛkṣa upasaṃkramaṇam
ye ca sattvāḥ mām upasaṃkrāmantam paśyeyuḥ
teṣām ca aham sattvānām sarva puṇya samuccayena

original: samādhinā tathārūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ yathā te sattvāstribhiryānaistīvracchandā udyujyeyuḥ /
analyzed: samādhinā tathārūpam dharmam deśayeyam yathā te sattvāḥ tribhiḥ yānaiḥ tīvra chandāḥ udyujyeyuḥ

original: ye ca tatra sattvāḥ pratyekabuddhayānikāste sarve vairocanakusumāṃ kṣāntiṃ pratilabheyuḥ;
analyzed: ye ca tatra sattvāḥ pratyekabuddha yānikāḥ te sarve vairocana kusumām kṣāntim pratilabheyuḥ

original: yaiśca mahāyānabījaṃ prakṣiptaṃ bhavet te sarve vajradharasamudrasaṃkopitaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheyustena ca samādhinā tisro bhūmiratikrāmeyuḥ
analyzed: yaiḥ ca mahāyāna bījam prakṣiptam bhavet te sarve vajradhara samudra saṃkopitam samādhim pratilabheyuḥ tena ca samādhinā tisraḥ bhūmiḥ atikrāmeyuḥ

original: svayaṃ cāhaṃ tṛṇasaṃstaraṇaṃ gṛhṇīyāṃ bodhivṛkṣamūlavajrāsane prajñapayeyaṃ niṣīdeyaṃ paryaṅkamābadhvā ṛjukena kāyena;

tathārūpam aham āsphānakam dhyānam dhyāyeyam
āśvāsa praśvāsāḥ vyupaśameyam
eka vāram divasena dhyānāt vyuttiṣṭheyam
vyutthāya ca aham ardha tilaka phalam āhāram āhareyam
ardham pratigrāhakasya anuprayaccheyam
tāvat ciram ca aham evaṃrūpām duṣkara cārikām careyam

original: yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanaparyantena sarve devā ye sahe buddhakṣetre paryāpannāsta upasaṃkrāmeyurmama ca pūjāṃ kurvāṇāḥ,
analyzed: yāvat akaniṣṭha bhavana paryantena sarve devāḥ ye sahe buddhakṣetre paryāpannāḥ te upasaṃkrāmeyuḥ mama ca pūjām kurvāṇāḥ
sarve me sākṣiṇaḥ syuḥ duṣkara caryāyām

original: yaiśca tatra śrāvakayāne bījamavaruptaṃ syātteṣāṃ bhadanta bhagavan kleśavyupaśamāya santāne bhaveyaṃ,
analyzed: yaiḥ ca tatra śrāvaka yāne bījam avaruptam syāt teṣām bhadanta bhagavan kleśa vyupaśamāya santāne bhaveyam
caramabhavikāḥ ca mama vaineyāḥ bhaveyuḥ
ye pratyekabuddha yānikā
yāvat yathā pūrva uktam
evam nāga yakṣa asura garuḍa kinnara mahoraga preta piśāca kumbhāṇḍāḥ pañca abhijñāḥ ṛṣayaḥ upasaṃkrāmeyuḥ mama pūjā karmaṇe
sarve ca me sākṣiṇaḥ bhaveyuḥ duṣkara caryāyām
ye ca śrāvaka yānikāḥ yāvat yathā pūrva uktam

original: ye ca tatra cāturdvīpikāyāmanyatīrthikā lūhatapo vrataduṣkaracārikāṃ caranti,
analyzed: ye ca tatra cāturdvīpikāyām anya tīrthikāḥ lūha tapaḥ vrata duṣkara cārikām caranti

na yūyam duṣkara kārakā

original: yathāsmin pradeśe caramabhaviko bodhisattvo duṣkaracārikāṃ carati,
analyzed: yathā asmin pradeśe caramabhavikaḥ bodhisattvaḥ duṣkara cārikām carati

original: tathārūpaṃ dhyāyati hṛdaye manaskāraṃ badhnāti praśrabdhakāyasaṃskāraḥ praśrabdhavāksaṃskāraḥ praśāntāścāsya praśvāsāśvāsāḥ;
analyzed: tathārūpam dhyāyati hṛdaye manaskāram badhnāti praśrabdha kāya saṃskāraḥ praśrabdha vāc saṃskāraḥ praśāntāḥ ca asya praśvāsa āśvāsāḥ
dine dine ca ekām velām dhyānāt vyutthitvā ardha tilaka phalam āhāram āharati

original: sā duṣkaracaryā maharddhikā sā mahāphalā mahāvistārā,
analyzed: sā duṣkara caryā maharddhikā sā mahā phalā mahā vistārā
na cireṇa asau anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate
saced na śraddhadhvam gacchata svayam paśyata

original: te ca tāṃ duṣkaracaryāmutsṛjya mama duṣkaracaryāṃ dṛṣṭvā yeṣāṃ śrāvakayānasantānabījāṅkuraṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ syāt,
analyzed: te ca tām duṣkara caryām utsṛjya mama duṣkara caryām dṛṣṭvā yeṣām śrāvaka yāna santāna bīja aṅkuram pratiṣṭhitam syāt

original: yaiśca mṛgapakṣibhiḥ śrāvakayāne bījānyavaropitāni tenaikajātipratibaddhā mama caiva vaineyā bhaveyurye pratyekabuddhayānā yāvad yathā pūrvoktaṃ
